\begin{table}
Probability of selecting two types and selecting the true
\begin{centering}
\begin{tabular}{ccccc}
\hline 
Sample size & Prob $Ez_{t}w_{t}=0$ & Prob $Ew_{t}\varepsilon_{t}=0$ & Prob True & Prob Efficient\tabularnewline
\hline 
$T=500$ & 0.8220 & 0.8870 & 0.7360  & 0.8720\tabularnewline
$T=1000$ & 0.9810 & 0.9580 & 0.9390 & 0.9530\tabularnewline
$T=2000$ & 0.9990  & 0.9930  & 0.9920 & 0.9900\tabularnewline
\hline 
\end{tabular} 
\par\end{centering}
\centering{}\caption{Adaptive Lasso Selection Results}
\end{table}
